name: solatium
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
something, for example money, that is given to someone to make them feel better when they have suffered in some way: A solatium in the form of an apology was offered to the Prime Minister. Solatia payments of approximately $2,000 were given to the families of 19 innocent civilians who died as a result of the attacks.
More examplesFewer examplesThe bank may ask a court for award of solatium.The actress was awarded solatium of £10,000 for the false suggestion that she can't sing.
